name: Intergenerational Program
description: Our Intergenerational Program provides an array of arts-based activities and events that promote brain health while sharing knowledge and experiences with younger generations.
fullDescription: Our Intergenerational Program provides an array of arts-based activities and events that promote brain health while sharing knowledge and experiences with younger generations.
whatTheyOffer: Our Intergenerational Program provides an array of arts-based activities and events that promote brain health while sharing knowledge and experiences with younger generations.
howToGetIt: For more information contact William Rhodes, Program Manager william.rhodes@bhpmss.org
